head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MOSS, IRVING M., ESQ

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MOSS, IRVING M., ESQ

block.p: MOSS-Irving M., Esq. Former partner at Richenthal, Abrams and Moss. Beloved brother of Rashie Flax, Esther Fuss and Shirley Mangel and the late Harry, David, Julius and Louis Moss and Beatrice Solodkin. Cherished uncle of many nieces and nephews. Services on Thursday 11:30 AM at ''The Riverside'', 76th Street and Amsterdam Avenue.

MOSS-Irving M., Esq. Former partner at Richenthal, Abrams and Moss.
